website_summaries.verdict: Offers similar qualities as others on our list, including food grade rating – plus the included duster is a bonus when it comes to insect control uses.
pros: Food grade, pure diatomaceous earth free of additives
Comes with a handy duster that is helpful for a variety of applications
cons: Not all consumers saw results when using it to control insects

customer_reviews.title: Use it for people and animals
customer_reviews.text: I rescue animals and am a holistic wellness coach. I add it to horse food (my horse is 36 years old ), goat food, dog food and drink in 6 ounces of water for my wellness. I am 83 years old and am never sick.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Arbuthnot

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it .. works better than pyrethrum (organic insecticides).
customer_reviews.text: Man, oh, man .. I should have bought this years ago. Bottom line, I no longer have problems with aphids and other insects eating my garden and flowers. It works better than the "safe" chemicals for vegetables .. much better. Sure, it won't kill things instantly, but just dust the plants a bit after every rain and if your garden is like mine .. you'll be insect free. Note --- this is bad mojo for pollinating insects. So if you have plants that flower and/or require bees .. then keep this away from those plants.
customer_reviews.author: David Lethe

customer_reviews.title: Pest problem
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for the bed bug problem and so far it's working well. Update : as of January of this year they are gone. Yippy !!!
customer_reviews.author: TINA M MLNARIK

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that everyone get a bag of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I recommend that everyone get a bag of this stuff.... Having been using it for 2 weeks now and it works internally and externally... I am greatful for the day I discovered this and decided to order it.this came well packaged and I didn't even have to dig for the pump it was right until...since I'm taking this I feel so much more energetic.. My skin is clearing up and overall I just feel healthier... Button line is I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dushi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I use it to keep insects off my garden plants. Keep all bugs from entering my house/garage. I mix a little in my dogs water bowls for the minerals in it. I also drink it in my smoothies a few times a month. Safe & healthy...except for the bugs!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Glita

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a kid-friendly way to get rid of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a kid-friendly way to get rid of the fleas my cats brought into the house. This worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Snankey

customer_reviews.title: IT KILLS BED BUGS ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: BED BUGS !!! If you have them, you need this. I spread all over the apartment, all over the mattress and box and cracks... everywhere !!! Although we found out the breakout was in our neighbor's apartment few doors down the corridor, we got some and managed to finally kill the bugs with that ! I spent hundreds on sprays and other pseudo-solutions but we really got rid of them with the Earth. It is natural, non-toxic, kids and animal can walk and touch, even put in their mouth and they wont have any problem. Great product, great package. Just buy a mask to spread it out. The dust is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Magalhaes

customer_reviews.title: Life get improve !
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad to found this product, start to using daily basis for myself, dog,chickens even sprinkle at chicken coop , it is work on ants pile and cockroach , I don't need to touch chemical stuff no more and the powder duster came with the box is real handy , I think they earn the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Coffman

customer_reviews.title: I never write a review on anything.. no ...
customer_reviews.text: I never write a review on anything..no matter how well the product works...but this stuff is MAGIC. My whole yard (almost 2 acres) was full of fleas, gnats, and other nasty bugs. I put some of the D.E here and there just a couple days ago. So far, I'm not noticing as many critters everywhere. I also put some on my dog and cat and their fleas have disappeared. This D.E works wonders. I also put it on my carpets...no more fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.  Non Toxic.  Bed bugs can not develop a tolerance.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Non Toxic. Bed bugs can not develop a tolerance to it because it kills mechanically. It takes a while to work on the bugs but it seems effective. Completely getting rid of Bed Bugs is a huge problem and I think diatomaceous earth can play an important part.
customer_reviews.author: Didg

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for killing creepy crawlies without the worry of injuring my pets!! One of my dogs recently was very sick, so I'm vigilant about using anything that could harm them! Also good for the environment!! No worries about "poisons" getting into the ground water!! Great product! Love the duster! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cajundiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for killing fleas without having to use harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to a flea infestation I was beginning to have in my house. I have kids so I did not want to use any harsh chemicals so I did some research and found that this product is a great way to get rid of those tiny buggers. Reason I gave four stars is for two reasons. Clean up is a pain because it’s like baby powder, it gets everywhere. Second reason is because I had to apply about three different time for it to fully get rid of the fleas. Other than that, if you need to get rid of fleas without having to use chemicals, this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben sanchez

customer_reviews.title: No more ticks
customer_reviews.text: It's a little messy to apply to my large yard but since using it I haven't seen any ticks on my dogs. Prior to using my dogs were getting ticks. I suggest wearing gloves because it made my hands very dry.
customer_reviews.author: sloro

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many things
customer_reviews.text: Our family uses diatomaceous for many things. We mix half a teaspoon and drink in water every morning. We use this as our main ingredient in homemade toothpaste. We bought this bag with the duster to fight a flea issue we are having this summer with our dogs. This stuff works great. Be persistent and reapply as necessary. Diatomeceous is great for health. Cleaning out your system and candida issues. Our family loves this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Thorsmom

customer_reviews.title: Buy it; safe around pets and no ants and it seems to be taking care of the ticks too.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this Diatomaceous Earth, Food Grade. I am liking it a lot. I have ants and ticks. Since beginning my use of this product, no ants, and thus far, no ticks where the little dogs go. I feel safe using it around my little dogs and the best thing I discovered about this stuff is that it relieves the itch from mosquito bites having discovered this while dusting the dog area, I was bitten by a mosquito and the dust stopped the itching dead on! I'd buy it just for that as mosquitoes love me.
customer_reviews.author: K-9 Lover

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, helpful product
customer_reviews.text: My husband works at an open pit DE mine, so I am very aware of what an awesome product it is!! Unfortunately, his company stopped making the "natural product" at the plant so I am looking for a new source. We have successfully wormed farm stock, used on destructive pests on plants, used on an ant infestation, and my favorite, I dust it all over my chicken house after I clean it and dust all the nests. I really count on this product around the farm! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: the watcher

customer_reviews.title: it worked wonderfully! I have also placed it in the shrubberies ...
customer_reviews.text: This definitely took care of my flea problem immediately. Be sure to remember to reapply after 2 weeks to kill any eggs that hatched in the meantime. I forgot. But again, it worked wonderfully! I have also placed it in the shrubberies around the house and have yet to see any new bugs around. Oh! And buy a cheap mask and gloves to wear while working with this, it puffs up in the air and it could cause inflammation if you have asthma.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toxic to insects only
customer_reviews.text: I've used diatomaceous earth before and thought this was a really good deal so ordered it thru Amazon. I like DE because it's nontoxic to birds that eat the insects I'm trying to kill. Also nontoxic to other living things. So if I am messy and get some on myself no worries. I can apply it on a breezy day, and it is always breezy where we live, and not worry about overspray. From previous experience I know that this is not a one time fix all but needs ongoing use and can be messy, but it is easy to apply and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Terrymisu

customer_reviews.title: Great for the flea battle!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 10lb. bag to battle a flea problem. While the included poofer makes it easy to disperse the Diatomaceous Earth around, expect an extensive and MASSIVE cleanup. This stuff is so fine it will literally blanket everything in your home. I don’t know if the fleas or the dusting was a bigger nightmare. This stuff does work miracles at killing unwanted bugs. Just do your homework on the process of getting rid of fleas. It takes time and consistent action to get results. Oh, and plan on a lot of dusting in the mean time!
customer_reviews.author: LittleBambino

customer_reviews.title: Last year this successfully got rid of the ants in ...
customer_reviews.text: Last year this successfully got rid of the ants in our backyard. Will be using again this year as soon as the weather is dry enough to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag had split seam in it.
customer_reviews.text: It was packed in a box and when I opened the box, the Diatomaceous Earth went everywhere and made a big mess. The duster spread clumps more than dust. I wonder if the sack being open it has a higher moisture content. I will never buy again. Disappointing on opening and worse every time I try to use it. I am going to have to throw most of it away as it seems to draw moisture with the opening in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R. Crauder

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: There should be 6 stars just for this product! I have heard about using Diatomaceous Earth for flea control for years now, and never tried it until now. HOLY COW DOES THIS STUFF WORK!!! After the first use, my 4 cats completely stopped scratching! Fleas are really horrible in my area this year, and I honestly something that is this natural, unscented and easy to use works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Really does kill fleas!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of "eco friendly " products as they seem to generally not work. However, after spending over $200 on prescription pet flea treatments that also didn't work, I decided to try this diatomaceous earth. I sprayed the dogs and their beds and the scratching stopped. The dogs hair is regrowing in the areas they chewed almost bald. We didn't get much of a freeze here in S. Central TX last winter and the fleas are really bad this year, but the diatomaceous earth was more than a match for them. Glad I bought the big bag!
customer_reviews.author: Judith B. Allbright

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ TEN STARS !!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge 5 pound bag of Beautiful, fine Diatomaceous Earth. Love that it comes with its own little Puffer. Love that it gives instructions on how to use the puffer. I did not know that if you flip the puffer upside down, it puffs out a larger amount of Earth. Overall it's a great product for a great value for the amount money because the bag is huge. It is good for keeping fleas and tics out of a chicken coop and keeping fleas away and for killing any insect that comes around. It will also stop flies from overpopulating and biting your dogs ears. It will also kill Parasites in your pets if you put it in their water.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: No duster in the bag. **Update: I contacted the seller and they sent me a whole new bag. Duster is great and now I'm using a lot less DE to cover my garden to keep the earwigs out!
customer_reviews.author: G. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very effective natural home flea control.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my home and mixed in the pet food, per the directions to effectively control what had been an obnoxious flea infestation. No toxic fumes, and the four-legged children feel much better now that they are no longer constantly scratching. Use for regular maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: MoodyVal

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest to use a dust mask and to avoid sleeping in the room where you recently treated the area because it really dries out your sinuses But it works better than anything
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for a bed bug situation and we were victorious in our battle with the blood sucking spawns of satan.I would suggest to use a dust mask and to avoid sleeping in the room where you recently treated the area because it really dries out your sinuses But it works better than anything .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for treating our yard for fleas. We own four dogs that go out to play in the yard. The fleas were so bad that we were spending a fortune on products to kill fleas. I checked out Diatomaceous Earth online and read several reviews. Figured I would give it a try. After only one application to our yard, I can honestly say we have no more fleas. Only wished I had discovered this product before spending hundreds of dollars on products that did not work. We will be using this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Burks

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff. my wife loves this stuff. the WolfSpiders hate it. So I love it more.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this around the outside base of the house for several months and the amount of bugs I see laying dead always surprises me. The fact that this is safe enough for consumption (I'm not saying eat it, I'm saying if a child accidentally brushes against it) makes me feel much more safe than most chemical applications. Unlike roaches (that clean their legs) that can be killed with traditional chemicals, this stuff kills WolfSpiders by scraping/tearing their exoskeleton. BIG WIN. Spiders don't lick their legs -- that's how most chemical killers kill the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Well that didn't work......
customer_reviews.text: Spread this stuff all over my house. Using the applicator I spread it all over the carpets, furniture. It literally got everywhere. Left it down for a couple of days then vacuumed. Repeated this process a couple of times and it never worked. All it did was cause me hours and hours of cleaning the dust off of everything in my house. Ended up having to bomd the house. It was a total waist of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: IZZI13

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all and is very destructive
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work and in fact made things worse and now I have 10 pounds of this stuff with no use for it. It clouded up so bad I had an asthma attack and almost ended up in the hospital. Its impossible to vacuum up completely and the smell once it's airborn lingers for days. To make things worse, because it didn't work my kitten died from feline anemia. The fleas drained her too far for even medicine to fix. Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.author: paul campbell

customer_reviews.title: Safe, works on bugs
customer_reviews.text: I keep a supply of this product. I sprinkle it in my kitchen cabinets, around doors, window sills - everywhere. I have cats and do not want them -or me -exposed to chemicals by exterminators.. I sprinkle it on my carpets and leave for several days for fleas, then vacuum and it helps control flea outbreaks. I apply small portions to a flea comb and use on my cats. Because it is safe, I believe in it wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: HappySoul

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product. It is super messy. It will stain your driveway or anything else it touches. Super nasty. It doesn’t kill insects or ants! The ants in my yard enjoyed digging all over it. I put it down for over a week and then watered it. Nothing has happened to the ants yet! When Amazon shopped the product, there were other items in the same box. The items were almost ruined because of the large amount of dust coming from the bag. It took me hours to clean the other items. If you decide to still order this mess - don’t order anything else with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great for fleas and ants.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the fleas but since I was trying a shotgun approach to get rid of them I am not sure how much this helped. I gave all my fur babies a flea bath and then a comfortis pill, I flea bombed the house, then I sprayed the house with insecticide then dusted all over with the DE. This did completely get rid of the crazy ants we used to get and its safe to dust around the kitchen. People just think you have been baking and got flower all over.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great duster, get your own container before it arrives
customer_reviews.text: It is a natural material so the source is pretty much the same as any other brand; whether it works or not is a matter of science, not production . However, his product is very finely milled and therefore will likely be most effective. The duster is better than expected and the directions turned out to be worth reading. For instance, practice with a small amount in the duster until you get the feel of how much will blow out. The "resealable bag", however, is useless. Since moisture will make the product clump, it needs to be sealed. No amount of effort resulted in successfully resealing the bag even once. I found an old kitty litter bin for storage.
customer_reviews.author: P. Davis

customer_reviews.title: And a little goes a VERY long way so don't overestimate the amount you need like I did
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it really helps as a natural insecticide. I still have fleas after making a mess of the house. And a little goes a VERY long way so don't overestimate the amount you need like I did.
customer_reviews.author: myluckynumber6

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great amount, worked great for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the garden when ants start moving aphids around or cabbage worms show up! It works great. It also deters/kills slugs and snails. I like using food grade just because it is food grade, and cost just about the same as non-food grade. The pump is useful but if you are using this in the garden you may find that it you have to fill it a lot! Great buy I will be using it for the next few seasons no doubt it will last a good long while!
customer_reviews.author: M rux

customer_reviews.title: Takes care of fleas!
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my flea infestation in just under two months. I had a horrible infestation and spreading this on my carpets once every two weeks and letting it sit for at least 8 hours took care of all the fleas in my house (paired with a flea treatment on my cat of course, and daily flea combing). It is incredibly fine and dusty though so if you don't want to be finding it on everything you own for months thereafter you'll want to cover everything before spreading the powder on your carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. The bag I received had a ziplock seal to close it back up after each use. The puffer that was included worked nicely and requires nothing but a few light taps to unclog nozzle if it gets plugged during use. Great product and love that's it is food grade. easy to use, great price, and works perfectly for killing crawling insects!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for results
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed a difference yet. I'm hoping to see a dramatic change soon. My little boy is still having a hard time with some fleas. I bathe him, treated him, washed his blanket and toys, and the dust is all over the house but he's still being attacked. Maybe it's too soon? It's been a week. I hope something changes soon! I only purchased it based off of some good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Shun

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this DE came with a duster. I have used it all summer. I used to just sprinkle it around the areas I wanted to protect, but the duster works great - much easier than trying to sprinkle it around with a paper cup. I have used it around the chicken coop as well as around the house. It takes care of potential ants, fleas and any crawlies that might come around. Remember to avoid breathing in the dust - once it settles, all is well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. D.

customer_reviews.title: Use a mask or you’ll regret it
customer_reviews.text: Warning: Make sure you have an actual proper mask before using this, & not the cheap ones either. I thought I had the right mask, but now my lungs are paying the price. It took a few weeks to see results, but this does work. It did it’s job well, but someone needs to stress that you need a proper mask before using. It the cheap masks, but something that actually filters that out like a N95 mask. I’m paying the price of not having the correct mask.
customer_reviews.author: Shanidew

customer_reviews.title: Not for human use
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends told me to buy this to eat because it had extra nutrients. I didn’t do my research beforehand and just bought it. It’s literally fertilizer and there are huge Warnings on the bag to not eat it. I returned it. Please don’t eat this people. It’s not for humans.
customer_reviews.author: Nici P.

customer_reviews.title: Revised
customer_reviews.text: I earlier posted that I was disappointed that the duster was not included. I have since dumped the entire bag out into a water-tight container and found that the duster was buried in the bottom of the powder. DE works mechanically, rather than chemically, to kill ants, so the effects might not be as immediately evident as when spraying a chemical poison. It works very well here in my arid region, but I do have to reapply it after it gets wet. I wear a mask and goggles so I don't breathe it. It does not seem to harm the reptiles, birds, gopher (I need those). I recommend this. I grow organic fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for flea control.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to help get rid of minor flea problem in my home. Took a couple applications but seems to have worked. I like how it is a non chemical way to treat bug infestations. Large bag with more than i needed. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Pest control
customer_reviews.text: I used it to kill flies and spiders around the outside of my house. I had a ton of flies coming from the bushes near my house. I sprayed this into the bushes and on them and the fly problem is gone. I also had ants coming into my bathroom so I sprayed this all around the base of my house and now no more ants in the bathroom. It comes with a device to spray the stuff where you need it, including into tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dusty - but effective
customer_reviews.text: In the never-ending battle against keeping insects outside the home, this has been an interesting new option. This stuff is dusty - and you WILL see the dust around the foundation or other places you spread it. In fact I still noticed the dust after a full winter of snow and ice. But it seems to work well. I used it on a ground bee nest next to my sidewalk and they were gone 24 hours later. No nasty chemicals or odors. The dusty factor would make me hesitant to use this indoors, although it would be safe to do so. The 10lbs has lasted 2 full applications around the house and still have plenty left.
customer_reviews.author: Stubby

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my fleas.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had fleas in my house. I put it down once a week for 3 weeks and vacuumed it after 24 hours. It did help but not completely. I decided to put it on my carpet and then vacuum after 3 weeks (life cycle of a flea from egg to adult). It was tough leaving my carpet unvacuumed for 3 weeks but it did the trick. My house is completely flea free and I didn't have to endanger my pets by using poisinous chemicals. If you can stand not vacuuming for 3 weeks then I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R. Hinrichs

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to rid the house of fleas and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to rid the house of fleas and have seen a 0% improvement after covering every inch of the house with it, vacuuming every day and reapplying all over the house. To be noted, the pets are on a strong monthly vet prescribed flea treatment that also seems to be completely ineffective. So maybe we're dealing with mutant fleas.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Stop all bed bugs for me
customer_reviews.text: After a few months all bed bugs disappeared. It really works well and no harm to human since it is all natural. I have to use my Dyson vaccumme to suck away left over bed bugs around the ceiling and wall edge. Now they are all gone and I am fine. What a magic !
customer_reviews.author: Jack T

customer_reviews.title: Arrive quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product. I moved into an apartment and within 30 days my cats had fleas! They had never had them before!!! So I was very upset. I have children too and I didn't want anything dangerous around them. This was perfect! I received it nearly a month ago and already we are seeing less fleas and the cats are not scratching as much. Apparently this product is like glass to fleas and shreds them. Though nothing gets rid of the eggs... so ya know... I'll just have to keep up with rubbing the cats down every week.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Use a shaker for less mess
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how effective this is, as I purchased as a preventative method. However I employ other efforts as well, but I have dogs so felt adding this to my regimen couldn’t hurt. THIS IS MESSY. If you use the puffer it will create a smoke cloud throughout the house. I found that by using a shaker to evenly distribute on the carpet created less of a mess. It did lay it on thick enough for it to be visible but I’d rather see white dust on my carpet for a few days than fight a cloud of smoke until the dust settles. Overall I’m satisfied, the dogs are safe and we’ve not seen any critters.
customer_reviews.author: Careem Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Applied once for roaches. They were still there. Applied again and started noticing them dead. Week or two after that and I haven't seen one for a while. Pretty sure this stuff works. Will apply again to make sure, but they give you 10 lbs so no worries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for bedbugs and roaches!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and absolutely works as advertised for bugs. Please follow package instructions for safety, this stuff is worse then a dust storm when your laying it, if you aren't careful. Also, yes it does feel like itchy fiberglas insulation if your skin gets a dash of it. After it settles, there isn't to worry about for kids or animals, and if you use the thin layer as recommended most bugs ignore it. The little duster is about as tall and round as a quart size paint can, and is able to do tiny holes (baseboard and cracks) wide open areas (under cabinets or beds), by flipping it upside down and shaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for Bed Bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for bed bugs, don’t waste your money on this if your trying to kill bed bugs... I caught a bed bug, put it in a plastic cup with the DE and the bug lived for two weeks before it finally died... bug was in and exposed DE the entire time, this won’t do anything to bugs that walk through a barrier of this stuff besides coat them white. Best thing that ended up working was color safe bleach in a weed killer spray bottle under pressure. That kills them on sight and is easier than steaming which had mixed results.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Plimith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new Go-To for ants, rats or anything else thats deciding to camp out at your place!! I had rat poo inside my bathroom and kitchen, so I put a thick line all along the garage and inside house at corners of windows where ants come in. AND wow! haven't seen a clue of anything!! Not a clue!!! This stuff is magic in my opinion. My cousin, sister and friend have got on board as well. I do use Terminix but it only works for so long before I would have to call them again. Seriously try if you have pests at home. Works for us.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: packaged well and received quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with a dispersing plunger. Makes it easier to use and spread. Seems like great quality. Have been using it outdoors and in my dog's food to assist with killing the whipworm he picked up outdoors from a wild animal. It has made his healing process much more manageable after 6 weeks of suffering terrible diarrhea. Would definitely recommend. It's also great for killing fleas too!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Pack

customer_reviews.title: I have found this works great for deterring scorpions around my home and keeps unwanted ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has a place in my gardening routine and pest management. I have found this works great for deterring scorpions around my home and keeps unwanted pests out of my garden. I also like the fact its OMRI listed.
customer_reviews.author: AZshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used this to get rid of fleas on my mother's cats, since I do my best to avoid using poison on our family pets. It worked like a charm, and I was able to rest easy knowing it was 100% safe for the cats to ingest (because I knew there was no way to keep them from furiously grooming it off later). The duster was great for spreading it on the hardwood and carpet, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: great bug control
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd bag of DE. i get it for insect control, fleas, house spiders, ants, roaches. 1st bag lasted about 4-5 years. i place outside around the house and inside in hidden nooks and crannies. ant n an occasional spider is all ive seen since. first time using a puffer, and wow!!!! makes application a little less messy and much quicker. dont forget protective goggles and mask, you dont wanna breathe this stuff in :-D
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled E-buyer

customer_reviews.title: Messy delivery, missing product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet, but the bag arrived with a giant hole in it. The diatomaceous earth powder was all over the rest of the contents of my order (with other products) and all over the box as well. I was in for a messy surprise and had to clean up after opening the box! I can change the review if I can be compensated for this mess and loss of product! Edited/Update: amazon.com compensated me for the mess and lost product. I'll update the review again when I see how effective it is on controlling fungus in my animals and around my home.
customer_reviews.author: intertwangled

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when opening package!
customer_reviews.text: This came so tightly packed in the Amazon box that I slit the bag when I was trying to open the box. Very disappointing. I have to figure out how to repackage it in a moisture proof container. But I love this stuff. I stirred a bunch into a fire ant hill, applying and stirring a couple times. They are gone. Such dreadful things here in FL. Non-native little terrors. And I refuse to use poison. Boiling water and DE.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for fleas
customer_reviews.text: I have used DE in the coop in the past, though I would try this as suddenly the dogs and indoor cats have fleas. We have tried so many other things that didnt work, and sad to say, this isnt helping either. I even put some in a tub with this DE, and 3 days later, they are still bouncing around in there. How long does it suppose to take?!
customer_reviews.author: holl

customer_reviews.title: Seal on bag does not work
customer_reviews.text: This bag has an extremely tiny seal at the top that does not reseal if any powder gets on it, which is impossible not to, considering its a bag full of powder... This really disappoints me because I dont have another giant air tight storage container for 10 lbs of powder. Other than that everything seems to be as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I paid the additional 5 dollars for this product as opposed to others is that it was supposed to include a duster and after 5 minutes of being arm deep in diatomaceous earth, I found out that the duster was missing. In addition, the "resealable bag" is a joke. It's near impossible to close back up. Save yourself some money and buy the other brands update: after emailing them, they apologized and are sending me a duster separately, but I still suggest using a different container for storage as the bag is pretty useless
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ten Eyck

customer_reviews.title: Natural treatment for ants
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with some fair skepticism.I had some ants in my garden that I wanted to take care of naturally. Essentially this stuff is harmless to us (unless you breathe it into your lungs or rub it in your eyes) but to ants they are jagged edges so when you send this into an ant hill you are sending millions of knives into their home. Eventually they end up all dying because the ants get cut up (morbid, I know). It wasn't instant but the ants were gone in a few days. I will use this as other issues arise.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Veggie Garden
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this stuff works well against pest in my garden. You have to apply it again after it rains, you have to deal with this white powder being on your veggie plants BUT you don't have the dumb little green worms eating up your plants, or grasshoppers, or aphids. Of course you don't apply it on the flowers of your veggie plants but I have found it works well on the backside and tops of the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: leah2310

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Say Enough About This Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has so many uses and is top quality from a brand I feel I can trust. Excellent value and the price is affordable. Will definitely buy again. Thanks so much for an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: JC Snow Angel 7

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Bag arrived in box with slice through it. Dust all over everything.
customer_reviews.text: The whole bag exploded inside of the box. The bag had been sliced open, then placed in an amazon box with other products. It was like opening a dust bomb. Everything was covered. Did not bother to check the quality of the product, closed the box after taking out the other items and throwing out the dusty packaging.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: ... (months) I can honestly say our hens are in best health ever
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for chicken mites and after a consistent period of use (months) I can honestly say our hens are in best health ever! The mites are not a problem anymore and the egg production is consistently great. The first time we used DE for treating a mite problem, I didn't have enough info and therefore did not use it long enough or consistently enough. We will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and not harmful to family or pets
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt know what to expect since it was my first time using this product. But we had a bad flea problem and tried other stuff and still couldnt get rid of the fleas. We used it inside on carpet and furniture and treated the yard as well. We even applied some to our dog. I can honestly say it worked like a charm! No more fleas. It took about 2 weeks of cleaning and reapplying. But we have been a flea free happy family I loved that there was no strong odor. It is safe if you have kids or pets
customer_reviews.author: Tina Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Easy access to Contents of bag and Accompanying puffer.
customer_reviews.text: The contents of the bag was light and fluffy allowing me to scoop up the needed amount in the accompanying puff sprayer without any difficulty. I coated the entire chicken coop with ease with no anxiety from the chickens. I'm sure they find not having to scratch their feathers makes them for happier birds.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Weglarz

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, clean product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to get rid of flour mites and it worked very, very well. It punctured the exoskeletons of them and they died off. I think it works well with all kinds of pests with exoskeletons and I hear it works well for internal parasites as well, but not sure, do your homework.
customer_reviews.author: American,and happy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say except this stuff works?! I love that it is totally safe for my chickens, turkeys, and guinea fowl, and I even put this in their feed holders to keep the insects out. The duster is a must, so if you’re considering buying the cheaper bag and just scattering this, think again. The duster sprays a fine mist of the powder better than you’d ever manage without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! It kills fleas quick!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to kill fleas in my house. The first time I sprinkled the powder on my carpets, which was a huge dusty mess, but it did kill the fleas. The second time, I mixed it with water and put it in a bowl and used a paint brush to apply it. It dries as powder form and so it's effective. It's not effective when wet, but it's much easier to apply when it's wet. I'm glad I took the chance and bought the product.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great and reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I've used diatomaceous earth products before to get rid of fire ants and had no success. They've destroyed many of my edible plants on the past. This stuff works great. The very first use, it killed an entire colony attacting a brand new rose bush that I had just planted. The ants are gone and it's about to bloom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will update review
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and had not used it enough to give it a 5 star yet but will be updating my review. However, I have heard plenty of good stuff about it and decided to give it a try. I’m looking for a natural way to repel fleas and am planning to put on lawn once it stops raining so heavy. I did apply some on my cat and dogs fur and have seen them scratch less.
customer_reviews.author: Tita

customer_reviews.title: Working so far!
customer_reviews.text: Used to help with the bugs in our yard and we have seen an improvement. The only con I can think of it trying to get the powder into the duster that came with it. It could have been a user error though. It just made a mess so I would recommend using a measuring spoon to put into the duster and maybe do it outside. Also it you do it inside (like I did) it will create a lot of dust. Haha! Do it before you leave or go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K.

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the earwigs
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely skeptical of this product, but I was desperate to get rid of all the earwigs eating my basil plants! It totally worked! It is a lot safer than the poison I had been using, so now I don’t have to worry about my little ones getting into the garden, or about poison staying on the basil leaves we are supposed to eat. I do a new application every week or so to keep the bugs at bay. So happy I found something that worked so my plants will actually grow now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my critters. Very pleased with this stuff. I'm using it for a dietary supplement for them and this stuff will also dampen flea populations that are in the carpet if you sprinkle on the carpet work it in let it sit for ten minutes or so then vacuum. You can also use this method on the critters them selves.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This stuff kills bugs quick
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Sprinkled some around my property to get rid of ants, termites and fleas and wow they are all gone in about 4 hours. I haven't seen any more yet. Works great and quick. I even put some on my cat and the fleas are gone. Great product. I also sprinkled some in my house and the ants are gone. If you have never ordered this then you really need too because this stuff works great!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the powder duster as advertised. The bag had been cut open and the contents had spilled all over the box it was sent in. The product is fine, but I'm so frustrated that the contents of the bag are all over my kitchen, I'm unable to apply this stuff to my plants, and I've lost money on all that has spilled out of the bag before it even got to me.
customer_reviews.author: rtwingmom

customer_reviews.title: Box fine but bag of diatomaceous earth had been cut
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using DE for the first time today, however, although the box was not damaged, the bag of DE had a cut in it and the DE was all over the inside of the box. I'm pretty sure it needs to remain sealed to be useful so I don't think I can use it because the bag is opened where it was cut. Bummer. Cleaning out the calf pen today and wanted to put it under the new bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters apartment had a lot of bed bugs all over her apartment. She has a cat and a dog and didn't want to use poison to kill them. The apartment was going to come in and spray, but I got this for her, she sprinkled it in all corners and along the edges of the floor, in a week, she didn't see one more bug and they're gone.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with results...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand of DE to resolve an issue with bed bugs. Even though it took over 2 weeks to see a considerable reduction in their presence, it worked and is still working to my satisfaction. I live in an apartment building where there is the expected traffic, so I know I will have to be vigilant in combating these little hitchhiking, bloodsucking monsters. This product's safe use around children and pets was a major reason for choosing it over using an insecticide.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: The best food grade DE you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use the DE to dust my chickens for parasites but it's also very fine that I can mix it up in their feed and kill the internal parasites. This brand of food grade DE is finer than a lot of other food grade DE's which makes it easier to sneak it in their food without the chickens tasting it. I've had them refuse to eat their food using other food grade DE brands... This is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ant killer
customer_reviews.text: Kills ants like crazy if they crawl through it!. A 10 pound bag will last a long time. Nuke the perimeter of your house, any supports for your deck, anywhere ants crawl and can get into your house. Give it a week or two, they'll be dead.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Chemical-free & NO fleas or ticks!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with DE was when our cat brought fleas in our house. I didn't want to set off chemical flea bombs & expose my family's lungs to that. I also don't like to use chemical spot-on treatments on our pets. So, I washed all bedding & pet bedding in hot water & sprinkled DE on all the floors. After 24 hours, I vacuumed it up & we had no more fleas. This spring, I was proactive & sprinkled DE all over our yard & we had no fleas or ticks all season. And, we live in a rural area.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside

customer_reviews.title: the house was starting to get bad. Applied
customer_reviews.text: Product works for bug issues. My dogs had fleas, the house was starting to get bad. Applied, no more fleas. Will do one more application maybe two just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya O.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! So many positive health benefits (DE food grade) for myself as well as my pups!!! Yet versatile enough to be an effective insect exterminate~ while safe for my pups to be around~which is a must! Very happy with my purchase! This will be my go to company every time I order! I have to say that your emails prior to the product arriving were a refreshing kinda human touch! Thank you! I'm sold!☺️
customer_reviews.author: Z S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product..no smell.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when we received the product. Put it down where needed. Love because there is no smell. Only thing... bought to get rid of the sugar ants that we have in the laundry room. It's winter!! can't believe we have ants. Anyway, it helped a little but they are still here. Tomorrow will be a week using your product. Thought we had it cleared up couple of days later but then a new batch appeared. I guess eventually they will disappear. We will keep working on getting rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: As shown
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I need, so I have to store in plastic containers, but I don't like to order it often. A great Product. I feed it to my cats for worms, and put it on them for fleas. I put it on the deck for ants- and on plants for other pest.I have taken it myself-so always get the food grade.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Hill

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Product seems ok. But don't order it with anything else or wear black when you open the box. They didn't wrap the bag the dust was covering everything. I am still coughing from inhaling the puff from when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Lynn Branchfield

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work on fleas
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue why so many people say they've had success with this product. I have applied it copiously to every surface in my house for 24 hours now and the fleas are just as bad if not worse. I woke up with 6 on me this morning alone. This stuff does NOT work and fits very snuggly into the homeopathic snake oil category. Do NOT waste your money and just put the $25 towards an exterminator instead. Now I have days of cleaning to do because of this powder and the same amount of fleas that I had to begin with. Utter waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Gerilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Uniform Quality
customer_reviews.text: We got just what we ordered, but we got it because we had read that diatomaceous earth would kill fleas on pets and in carpets, and it didn't do that. Frankly, I didn't expect it to do so. Used for any other proven purpose, this would be a good buy from what seems to be a good company.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Used inside & outside for Carpenter Ants
customer_reviews.text: So, it’s the consistency of flour, but when you get an infestation of Carpenter Ants... you won’t care. Plus it’s natural & animal friendly. Inside or outside the house it drys the ants from inside out. Remember to reapply when it rains & glad there was an applying tool to get into cracks & crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly, after I used this item. The scorpions just disappeared! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Messy and bad for your health
customer_reviews.text: Not going to call the effectiveness into question. The problem with this product is its messy and horrible for your health. Just opening the bag will release a dust cloud. Be prepared with a full face respirator! The product worked by slicing bugs with the microscopic sharp edges of the crystals. Doesn't that sound like asbestos? Don't buy it! Itll take forever to decontaminate and you risk contact since it's super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it worked on fleas
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 outside kittens since they tend to get fleas rather quickly and I can't continuously use Frontline on them. I rubbed this throughout their fur and put it on their bedding, but I'm not sure it really did anything. Everytime they would shake or run around, the powder would just fly off of them as well. I also found that the duster that came with it didn't really distribute the powder that well. I ended up using a small scooper instead to speed up the process.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great natural remedy
customer_reviews.text: I love this for puffing around the house,in the garage and outside on plants. It is safe for my dogs if they happen lick it. I never have bugs of any kind around. I have even sprinkled it on their food. Go to their site as this is a natural fix for many things.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

product_meta.title: HARRIS Diatomaceous Earth Food Grade, 10lb with Powder Duster Included in The Bag
feature_bullets: Natural Product - Composed of 10lbs of 100% ground freshwater diatomaceous earth with absolutely no additives or fillers.
OMRI Listed - Listed with the Organic Minerals Research Institute, a non-profit organization that reviews products against organic standards.
Powder Duster Included - Powder duster in the bag for easy and efficient application of diatomaceous earth on animal feed
Supports a Great Cause - Harris donates 10% of profits to support the local Etowah Valley Humane Society.
Made in the USA – Mined in Nevada and packaged in Georgia

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,175 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
